title: Google Pixel can't connect to Smart TV
content:
My pixel 3a won't connect to my hisense smart tv.

I've read other forums and it's because google is blocking non-google connectors. So no chrome cast no connection.

But it works if the smart tv and my phone have the same app (re: Netflix)

Google - don't be a bag of d*?ks, the whole point of android is to cross barriers that Apple uses.
